TopicTitle: Is it possible to view the flags you've planted?

Articles.Content: Is there anyway to view flags that you've previously planted? like for example, Say I planted a flag on the Mun and left, is there any way to view the site where I landed without having to physically go there with a craft?
From the tracking station, you click on the flags -- so that all the flags get listed. Then you select the flag you want and hit the "Fly" button.
